name: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Bank
name_original: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Bank
description:
Road Hero Speed Car Racing Bank is an arcade racing game. 

Drive your vehicle to transfer bank money through superbly stunning roads, collect coins, avoid traffic cars .

KEY FEATURES OF ROAD HERO SPEED CAR RACING BANK-

- Easy intuitive gameplay! - Interesting Story! - Lots of Coins to collect! - Avoid Collisions with traffic!  - Race through exciting tracks! - Experience thrilling audio and visual effects!

Instructions to play: 

Left and Right to steer the vehicle.

Up to accelerate the vehicle.

Enter to Pause and Un-Pause the game.
